author: Home Repair Tutor
description: PEX A shower valve tip…I expand the sleeve and tubing 5 to 6 times then slide them onto the valve. For tight areas, I use the SharkBite PEX bend support. This bends the PEX A without kinking it, eliminates extra fittings, and saves time. Many thanks to SharkBite for providing the PEX A supplies for this project 🔥#plumbing #pex #sharkbiteplumbing #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: PEX A Shower Valve Tip - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
